collectible.title: Ferri-chan's Collar
collectible.subtitle: A duplicate of Felix's collar. It jingles when you walk!
collectible.text: The cute collar that Felix wears. If you wear it, he might compliment it!

collectible.title: A gift from Felix and Mari S.
collectible.subtitle: Something you can remember your time with them by.
collectible.text: "I've had lots of fun with you! You should play with Mari and I again!"
collectible.unlock: Make Felix and Mari both lose. You must be male. Winner does not matter.

collectible.title: Ferri-chan's Bows
collectible.subtitle: Two white bows with blue and yellow ribbons. They feel soft in your hair.
collectible.text: Bows that are strikingly similar to the ribbons that Felix wears. Unlocks a softer, kinder side of Felix behind that playful mask.
collectible.unlock: Play three games in total with Felix. Winning or losing does not matter.
